# VirtualScrollerRuntimeParams.estimatedItemSize property

Estimated height/width of scrollable item. Orientation is determined by [VirtualScrollerInitialParams.horizontal](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerinitialparams.horizontal)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
estimatedItemSize?: number;
```

## Remarks

Actual size is always reported by internal `ResizeObserver` when [VirtualScroller.attachItem()](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.attachitem) is called. Bad item size assumptions can turn into shaky scrolling experience. Accuracy here is rewarded.
